Headline: #51 51st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Hermitage
ShortDescription: 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Ashland, 47th, Damen and 51st: due to, street blockage near 31st/Hermitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Ashland, 47th, Damen and 51st: due to, street blockage near 31st/Hermitage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Northbound Reroute near Clark/Harrison
ShortDescription: Northbound #22 buses will operate via Clark, Harrison, Dearborn, ending at Dearborn/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 buses will operate via Clark, Harrison, Dearborn, ending at Dearborn/Harrison.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #51 51st Temporary Reroute at 51st/Hermitage
ShortDescription: 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Ashland, 47th, Damen and 51st due to, street blockage near 51st/Hermitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Ashland, 47th, Damen and 51st INCLUDING NORMAL START/END STREETS, due to street blockage near 51st/Hermitage.

Allow extra travel time.
